text:
If you use the outputProperty of <sshexec> with a single command, you get the
output of the command. But if you set a commandResource to point to a file full
of commands, the outputProperty is set, using Project.setProperty(), after every
line

1. it should be using setNewProperty(), otherwise it is a way to make properties
mutable,

2. we should save up all the output and save it at the end, somehow.
creator: stevel@apache.org
bodewig@apache.org
text: looks as if it was fixed in svn revision 581576 and merged into 1.7.1
